main event: A sighting of a star-like object in Dalton, Massachusetts on October 6, 1966, observed for 2 hours.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant red and white star-like object that fluctuated in elevation,The witness reported seeing 5 or 6 similar objects on different nights since the initial sighting,The observer was a registered nurse who was not excitable about what she saw,Surveillance by the Air Force was mentioned but they had poor tracking of the sightings,The object appeared to disappear slowly and was described as hovering at various times.
sighted object: a brilliant red and white star-like object
witness description: A civilian registered nurse, age 30, who observed the phenomena with her husband.
